data.name: Bicycle Pump
data.description: Can be recycled into crafting materials.

data.name: Binoculars
data.description: A basic pair of binoculars with two levels of magnification.

data.name: Bison Driver
data.description: A critical control component from a Bison vehicle.

data.name: Black Eye (Face Style)
data.description: Maintain at least Rookie III rank in trials until season end.

data.name: Black (Hiker Colour)
data.description: A new cosmetic variant will be added to your collection for the Hiker backpack

data.name: Black & White (Origin Color)
data.description: A new cosmetic variant will be added to your collection. Complete Off the Radar Quest.

data.name: Blaze Grenade
data.description: A grenade that detonates on impact, covering an area in fire that deals damage over time.

data.name: Blaze Grenade Blueprint
data.description: Lets you craft a Blaze Grenade

data.name: Blaze Grenade Trap
data.description: A laser trip wire that detonates a Blaze Grenade

data.name: Bloated Tuna Can
data.description: A can of tuna, suspiciously bloated.

data.name: Blue Gate Cellar Key
data.description: Unlocks certain cellar doors near the Blue Gate.

data.name: Blue Gate Communication Tower Key
data.description: Unlocks a door by the Communication Tower near the Blue Gate

data.name: Blue Gate Confiscation Room Key
data.description: Unlocks a door to the confiscated goods area within the Blue Gate tunnels

data.name: Blue Gate Village Key
data.description: Unlocks a door to one of the old village buildings near the Blue Gate.

data.name: Blue Light Stick
data.description: A throwable chemical light that illuminates the area around it.

data.name: Blue Light Stick Blueprint
data.description: Lets you craft a Blue Light Stick.

data.name: Blue (Radio Renegade Color)
data.description: A new cosmetic variant will be added to your collection. Complete the Switching the Supply Quest.

data.name: Blue Yellow (Aviator Color)
data.description: A new cosmetic variant will be added to your collection.

data.name: Burnt-Out Candles
data.description: After the grid fell candles became the preferred source of light for many. Unlike electricity, a good old candle will never fail you. Unless it's windy. Or raining. Or...

data.name: Camera Lens
data.description: Can be recycled into crafting materials.

data.name: Candleberries
data.description: A waxy berry that grows only during a small window each year. People have depended on them to make candles, foods and medicine for ages.

data.name: Candle Holder
data.description: Can be recycled into crafting materials.
